title: Hydrophobic modification enhances the microstructure stability of the catalyst layer in alkaline polymer electrolyte fuel cells
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26738-26746
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04019H, Paper

Jun Ma, Hualong Ma, Jiayi Lin, Yixiao Zhang, Li Xiao, Lin Zhuang, Pengtao Xu, Liwei Chen
Alkaline polymer electrolyte fuel cells (APEFCs) have achieved notable advancements in peak power density, yet their durability during long-term operation remains a significant challenge.
